cause.description:
this will help those affected by bullying
1. 1 out of 4 kids is Bullied. The American Justice Department says that this month 1 out of every 4 kids will be abused by another youth
2. Surveys Show That 77% of students are bullied mentally, verbally, & physically
3. 43% fear harassment in the bathroom at school.
4. Playground statistics - Every 7 minutes a child is bullied. Adult intervention - 4%. Peer intervention - 11%. No intervention - 85%.
cause.mission: put an end to bullying and othert types of discrimination
cause.name: Stop Bullying and Cyber Bullying
